languages.text: "Я доверяю твоей бдительности, Хейнрикс. А ты доверься моей праведной ярости, если обнаружишь новых выродков".
"I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."
languages.original_text: "Я доверяю твоей бдительности, Хейнрикс. А ты доверься моей праведной ярости, если обнаружишь новых выродков".

traits.locale_text: "I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover more of those vile spawn."
"I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover more of those vile spawn."
"I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."
"I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."
"I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."
"I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."
"I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."

languages.text: "Ich vertraue auf Eure Wachsamkeit, Heinrix. Und ich hoffe, Ihr vertraut auf meinen rechtschaffenen Zorn, wenn Ihr noch weitere dieser Missgeburten entdeckt."
languages.original_text: "I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."

traits.locale_text: "Ich vertraue auf Eure Wachsamkeit, Heinrix. Und ich hoffe, Ihr vertraut auf meinen rechtschaffenen Zorn, wenn Ihr noch weitere dieser Missgeburten entdeckt."

languages.text: « Je m'en remets à votre vigilance, Heinrix. Et j'espère que vous vous en remettrez à votre tour à ma fureur vengeresse si d'aventure vous découvrez d'autres abominations. »
languages.original_text: "I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en remets à votre vigilance, Heinrix. Et j'espère que vous vous en remettrez à votre tour à ma fureur vengeresse si d'aventure vous découvrez d'autres abominations. »

languages.text: «Confío en su vigilancia, Heinrix. Igual que espero que confíe en mi furia justiciera si encuentra más abominaciones como esta».
languages.original_text: "I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."

traits.locale_text: «Confío en su vigilancia, Heinrix. Igual que espero que confíe en mi furia justiciera si encuentra más abominaciones como esta».

languages.text: 「ハインリックス、あなたの不信感を信用しているわ。そして、これ以上忌まわしいものを発見したら、今度は私の正義の怒りを信じてほしいの」
languages.original_text: "I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、あなたの不信感を信用しているわ。そして、これ以上忌まわしいものを発見したら、今度は私の正義の怒りを信じてほしいの」

languages.text: “我相信你的警惕，海因里希。如果你以后再发现像这样的邪恶行为，我希望你也能相信我正义的愤怒。”
languages.original_text: "I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."

traits.locale_text: “我相信你的警惕，海因里希。如果你以后再发现像这样的邪恶行为，我希望你也能相信我正义的愤怒。”

languages.original_text: "I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."

languages.text: "İhtiyatlılığına güveniyorum Heinrix. Ayrıca başka ucubelere denk gelirsen senin de benim erdemli öfkeme güveneceğini umuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I trust your vigilance, Heinrix. And I hope that you will trust in my righteous fury if you discover any more of these abominations."
